flawed_nl_solution:
Each classroom will have 41 boys because 56 boys divided into 4 classrooms equals 41 boys per classroom.
Each classroom will have 11 girls because 44 girls divided into 4 classrooms equals <<44/4=11>>11 girls per classroom.
In total, each classroom will have 52 students because 41 boys plus 11 girls equals 52 total students.
#### 52

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 41. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
